issue.title: [C++] Use BUILD_TESTING=OFF for abseil-cpp
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-18036](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-18036). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
In https://github.com/abseil/abseil-cpp/commit/a50ae369a30f99f79d7559002aba3413dac1bd48, the argument changed from `ABSL_RUN_TESTS` to `BUILD_TESTING`. A verbose thirdparty build now shows that ABSL_RUN_TESTS is being ignored. (BUILD_TESTING seems to be OFF by default, so it's probably not a big deal, but we can be explicit.)
